name: Disobey_Protocol
description:
A small 2D platformer game made during the Coding Blocks '23 game jam, following the theme "Everything is Backwards".

A small robot wakes up and decides to go against the orders it receives to become free. Don't follow your instructions.

[CodingBlocks Note : The browser version has been updated on the 24/01 at 14:00 to clarify the controls  to allow players to understand how to play. No technical content, mechanics or level element was added. The Unity build still remains untouched and downloadable at the same state as at the end of the Game Jam.]

===========

[Controls] 

E to interact

S to roll into a ball

W/Z or Space to jump

AD/QD to go left/right

============

Every asset in this game (with the exception of the text font and sound effects) was made during the duration of the event,  specifically for this game. 

This was a solo project! So, the amount of content I was able to produce was limited, however I would like to add some more elements (mostly visual improvements) in the future, so stay tuned for updates hopefully!  

Any feedback is welcome!

Software used for visual assets and animating : Krita

Developped on Unity 2021.3.8f1
